contentrichtext.text: '''Coldwater''' or '''Cold Water''' may refer to: ==Places== In '''Canada''': * [[Coldwater, Ontario]] * [[Coldwater First Nation]], a Nlaka'pamux First Nations government in British Columbia ** [[Coldwater 1]] aka Coldwater Indian Reserve No. 1, the main reserve of that First Nation, near Merritt, British Columbia * [[Coldwater River (British Columbia)]], a tributary of the Nicola River in British Columbia * [[Coldwater River Provincial Park]], British Columbia In the '''United States''': * [[Coldwater, Kansas]] * [[Coldwater, Michigan]] * [[Coldwater, Mississippi]] * [[Coldwater, Missouri]] * [[Coldwater, Ohio]] *[[Coldwater, West Virginia]] * [[Coldwater Township, Butler County, Iowa]] * [[Coldwater Township, Branch County, Michigan]] * [[Coldwater Township, Isabella County, Michigan]] * [[Camp Coldwater]], an early settlement in Minnesota == Other uses == * [[Cold Water (album)|''Cold Water'' (album)]], 2003 debut album from Australian blues and roots singer Mia Dyson * [[Cold Water (film)|''Cold Water'' (film)]], 1994 French film by writer and director Olivier Assayas ==See also== * [[Coldwater Canyon]] in Los Angeles * [[Coldwater Covered Bridge]] in Alabama * [[Coldwater Creek]], a women's apparel and accessories retailer * [[Coldwater fish]], aquarium fish that prefer cooler water temperatures * [[Coldwater High School (disambiguation)]] * [[Coldwater Lake State Park]], Branch County, Michigan * [[Coldwater River (disambiguation)]] * [[Cold Water Spring State Preserve]] in Iowa and Minnesota {{disambig}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
